.. autoclass:: {{ objname }}

   {% block methods %}
   {% if methods %}
   .. rubric:: {{ _('Methods') }}

   .. autosummary::
      :toctree:

   {% for item in methods %}
      {%- if not item.startswith('_') or item in ['__call__'] %}   ~{{ name }}.{{ item }}
   {% endif %}
   {%- endfor %}
   {% endif %}
   {% endblock %}

   {% block attributes %}
   {% if attributes %}
   .. rubric:: {{ _('Attributes') }}

   .. autosummary::
   {% for item in attributes %}
      ~{{ name }}.{{ item }}
   {%- endfor %}
   {% endif %}
   {% endblock %}
